mapper.select: select * from SSM_Hosp.hosp_register re inner join SSM_Hosp.hosp_doctor d where re.d_id = d.d_id
select * from SSM_Hosp.hosp_beHosp beH inner join SSM_Hosp.hosp_register re inner join SSM_Hosp.hosp_doctor d where beH.beH_id = re.re_id and beH.d_id = d.d_id

select beH.beH_id, re.re_name, charge.charP_name, charge.charP_money, price.checkTime from SSM_Hosp.hosp_beHosp beH inner join SSM_Hosp.hosp_register re on beH.beH_id = re.re_id inner join SSM_Hosp.hosp_pricePeople price on beH.beH_id = price.beH_id inner join SSM_Hosp.hosp_chargeProj charge on price.charP_id = charge.charP_id where beH.beH_id = #{beH_id} order by beH.beH_id
